question: What is the rank of India in the EIU’s report on ‘Cancer preparedness in Asia-Pacific’?
explanation:
The Economist Intelligence Unit (EIU) has recently launched a report on "Cancer preparedness in Asia-Pacific: Progress towards universal cancer control".
As per the report, India has been ranked eighth for cancer preparedness among 10 Asia-Pacific countries including Australia, China, Japan among others. Australia tops the Asia-Pacific region, followed by South Korea and Malaysia.
